import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import MyNavBar from '../Feeds/MyNavBar' import SideBarLeft from '../Feeds/SideBarLeft' import SideBarRight from '../Feeds/SideBarRight' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import MovieList from './MovieList' import MovieSearch from './MovieSearch' import { fetchMovies, } from '../../redux/actions' import Footer from '../Feeds/Footer' import CrytoNews from '../Crypto/CryptoNews' import FollowNewUsers from '../Feeds/FollowNewUsers' import MovieCatalog from './MovieCatalog' const Movies = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const scrollTop = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }; useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchMovies()) scrollTop() }, []) return (
{ (
{/*
*/} )} ) } export default Movies
